course_description: Solution of linear and nonlinear systems of equations, interpolation, least-squares approximation, numerical integration, and differentiation.
prerequisites: (MATH 221 or MATH_OX 221 or MATH 275 or MATH 321) and (CS 170 or CS_OX 170) or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
